products.title: Splash Tropez Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash tropez has an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. Their vertical blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which provides extra peace of mind that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Slate Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. products.title: Splash Duck Egg 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg vertical blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a go to for kitchens and bathrooms. Their vertical blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chrome control chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window.

products.title: Splash Ruby Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash ruby red is a saturated red vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this red vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Splash dark grey vertical blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash mid grey vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish, the mid grey fabric is a beautiful cool grey colour. This will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window, especially kitchen or bathroom windows. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.
